extendedInfo.description: Only the USA's best pilot can defeat the Nazis. Victory is at your fingertips!April 29, 1945As the top gun of the Air Force's elite fighter pilots, you have been chosen for a covert mission over enemy lines: To kill Adolf Hitler himself. Although it seems the Nazi menace has been beaten in Europe, the truth is far more shocking: At their most desperate hour, Hitler's Nazis are hiding a terrible secret that may just turn the tide of the war.Over land, over sea, through the air, and beyond our Terra Firma, test your skill and dexterity through three exciting levels against dozens of enemies using your flying mastery and all the power-ups you can grab.* * * BestAppsMarket.com Editor's Choice Featured App of the Day 11.15.11 * * *Game Features:+ Three exciting arcade-style levels of rapid-fire, non-stop action+ A unique auto-fire, touch-based control system+ 80s-style retro graphics+ An original soundtrack filled with old-school beats+ More than a dozen enemies with unique attacks+ Three challenging and original bosses+ Upgradable weaponry+ High score tables+ Four increasingly challenging difficulties+ Classic top-down Shoot 'em Up gameplay+ A fun, tongue-in-cheek story+ With no ads, all for absolutely freeOnly a daring ace with skills to match can defeat Hitler and the Nazi Menace. Will you deliver victory? Or defeat? It's at your skillful fingertips!!!-----Jon Hathaway - ProgrammingGregory Gallagher - Art & StoryBrian Crawford - MusicThis is our very first game and we hope you have fun.

reviews.title: Fun, if short!
reviews.comment: A great little shooter, sadly lacking in length or replay value, but fun nonetheless!

reviews.title: Short but a lot of fun
reviews.comment: Hilariously ridiculous story, catchy music and solid retro graphics make this a lot of fun. Only complaint (which is just as much a compliment) is how short it is, but hey, it\'s free!
